API_Description: Sets the action of a page in a document for a given trigger.

nPage.description: The 0-based index of the page in the document to which an action is added.

cTrigger.description: The trigger for the action. Values are:  Open Close

cScript.description: The JavaScript expression to be executed when the trigger is activated.

Examples:
This example causes the application to beep when the first page is opened.

```
this.setPageAction(0, "Open", "app.beep(0);");
```
